long_description: The portable REI Comfort Low chair sits low to the ground, making it ideal for outdoor concerts, trips to the beach and car camping. Headrest/lumbar pad slides up and down, allowing user to customize comfort; pad is attached to the chair, so it won't get lost. Steel tubing is strong and durable; powder coating keeps the steel frame looking nice for years of use. Chair folds down flat and comes with an adjustable, clip-off carry strap for easy transport. Durable hardware withstands heavy-duty use. Rear pocket stows small essentials.
short_description: The portable REI Comfort Low chair sits low to the ground, making it ideal for outdoor concerts, trips to the beach and car camping.
